General.Name: Founding Construction Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Founding Construction Development Corp. engages in the development of public housing and commercial building for leasing and selling in Taiwan. It also involved in the trading of construction materials and machines; designing and construction of interior decoration; and development of business building and civil construction. In addition, the company engages in catering and restaurant, and general hotel business, as well as general investment business. Founding Construction Development Corp. was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 294, Dunhua South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
